definitions.text: (of language) transparently clear; easily understandable; ; ; - Robert Burton

examples: a lucid moment in his madness

definitions.text: capable of thinking and expressing yourself in a clear and consistent manner
examples: she was more coherent than she had been just after the accident

definitions.text: transmitting light; able to be seen through with clarity
examples: the cold crystalline water of melted snow
could see the sand on the bottom of the limpid pool
